fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Survey the town, learning the exact role of every currently Striked player. This bypasses detection immunity.
- Guard the graveyard, preventing details of all deaths tonight of being released until the day after.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When guarding the graveyard, you will be able to see the roles, wills and last messages received of newly dead players.
- If one or more Striked players are alive, you may choose to clean one player when guarding the graveyard.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain basic defense.
- You do not have access to the factional Thundercry chat.
